Moroccan Heartbeat | World Journeys | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Moroccan Heartbeat - A Women only Tour 15 days | Auckland roundtrip Embark on a specially curated Women-only tour through Morocco, where food, culture, and textiles take centre stage. Travel from the windswept shores of the Atlantic Ocean to the golden sands of the Sahara Desert, weaving your way through vibrant cities, historic medinas, and breathtaking landscapes. Along the way, connect with inspiring local women who will share their stories, skills, and insights, offering a deeply personal perspective on Moroccan life. This elegant and luxurious itinerary promises not only unforgettable experiences, but meaningful cultural exchanges that will stay with you long after the journey ends. Deal Details Travel Dates 19 September 2026 Sale Ends Dec 31, 2025 Priced From $18,680 per person Enquire Now Embark on a specially curated Women-only tour through Morocco, where food, culture, and textiles take centre stage. Travel from the windswept shores of the Atlantic Ocean to the golden sands of the Sahara Desert, weaving your way through vibrant cities, historic medinas, and breathtaking landscapes. Along the way, connect with inspiring local women who will share their stories, skills, and insights, offering a deeply personal perspective on Moroccan life. This elegant and luxurious itinerary promises not only unforgettable experiences, but meaningful cultural exchanges that will stay with you long after the journey ends. Pricing From $18,680* per person, twin share From $23,570* per person, single Itinerary Day 1 Auckland to Dubai Day 2 Dubai via Casablanca to Rabat Day 3 Rabat to Chefchaouen Day 4 Chefchaouen Day 5 Chefchaouen to Volubilis to Fes Day 6 Fes Day 7 Fes Day 8 Fes to Merzouga Day 9 Merzouga to Skoura Day 10 Skoura to Ait Ben Haddou to Marrakech Day 11 Marrakech Day 12 Marrakech Day 13 Marrakech via Casablanca to Dubai Day 14 Dubai to Auckland Day 15 Arrive Auckland Inclusions & Exclusions Your Women-only tour includes: Women-only small group tour (min 8 / max 10) Economy Class airfares ex Auckland A World Journeys host Meals as per itinerary Farewell dinner Accommodation in 4-star hotels Transfers Dubai > Casablanca Sightseeing and entrance fees as per the itinerary Special Experiences Gratuities Not Included: Items of a personal nature Travel insurance (mandatory) Visas Flight upgrades to Premium Economy or Business Class Gratuity: In the countries you are visiting, tipping is customary. For a hassle-free journey, tipping is included for all group activities, and will be handled by the World Journeys host. Important Notes: Tour price is based on a minimum of 8 travellers. A supplement will apply if minimum numbers are not met. As this tour involves quite a bit of walking, in order for you to obtain maximum enjoyment and benefit from the itinerary, you must be able to walk a minimum of at least 4km unaided at one time. Unfortunately, this tour is not suitable for those with mobility issues. As cancellation fees apply, travel insurance is mandatory. Special Experiences Photography walk in Chefchaouen Capture the blue-washed beauty and unique charm of Chefchaouen through your lens on a guided photography walk. Cooking class Immerse yourself in local gastronomy while preparing flavourful local dishes in a hands-on cooking class. Pottery Artisanal Workshop Discover the intricate art of Moroccan pottery and perhaps even try creating your own piece in an artisanal workshop. Dinner with a female scholar Gain a deeper understanding of Moroccan culture and traditions over dinner with a knowledgeable female scholar. Luxury Desert Camp Experience the magic of the Sahara Desert in style with an overnight stay in a luxury camp, complete with comfortable amenities and cultural experiences. Marrakech Market tour with female chef Explore the vibrant sights, sounds, and smells of the Marrakech market with a local female chef, uncovering culinary secrets and tasting local delicacies. Terms & Conditions A non-refundable deposit of $3,000 per person is required, with the balance due 19 June 2026. In order to maintain the advertised tour price, if upgrading your Economy Class airfare to Premium Economy or Business Class, it will be necessary to collect the airfare portion earlier than the final balance date. As cancellation fees apply, travel insurance is mandatory. Please refer to World Journeys terms and conditions. Professional service fees apply. Experience the world differently.
